original_text: And when he had spent all, there arose a mighty famine in that land; and he began to be in want.
korean_text: 다 없앤 후 그 나라에 크게 흉년이 들어 그가 비로소 궁핍한지라

sentences.original_text: And when he had spent all
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 것을 다 썼을 때

sentences.original_text: there arose a mighty famine in that land
and he began to be in want
